title: I was just reported for telling someone to kill themselves.
body: We were doing really well then he kept getting poked and was down to around 150hp, so I told him to kill himself as he was low on HP, and he had a hissy fit that I shouldn't be telling people to kill themselves and that it's unethical. Honestly, this community is the worst. This is why I hate ARAM's.

replies.body: Good you should be reported. In fact, you should be banned. Telling someone to do that isn't right in any way. I dunno why you are complaining. Some people have different emotions to you. We all do. Respect that or your just as bad as the "community".
